title: ennai ninaittiDal
sahitya:
ennai ninaittiDal vENDum aruLuDan ennai ninaittiDal vENDum


anupallavi



caraNam 1    kannal mozhi madalai tannai marakkinum tAn maravAda annai enavE (nI)
    caraNam 2    dharma vazhi shaTrE tavari naDakkinum taDuttATkoNDiDa tatkSaNamE
    caraNam 3    ibbhuvi vAzhvu pirindiDum vELai appOdaikkippOdE uraittiTTEnenru
    caraNam 4    Ayiram pizhaigaL sheidiTTa pOdilum ambuja padamalar ninaikkum aDimaiyenru
